data.name: ReadAdministrativeAppeal
data.value: select top(1) ADMIN_APPEAL_ID, ADMIN_APPEAL_NO, TYPE, REQUEST_DT, RECEIVED_DT, RESPONDENT, APPELLANT_LAST_NM, APPELLANT_FIRST_NM, APPELLANT_MI, APPELLANT_SUFFIX, APPELLANT_REL, ADMIN_APPEAL_DT, ADMIN_ORDER_DT, WITHDRAW_DT, REQ_FURTHER_REV_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TSTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, CSP_Q_NUMBER, JUD_REVIEW_IND, REASON, OUTCOME, REVIEW_OUTCOME, WITHDRAW_REASON, REQ_FURTHER_REVIEW, ADMIN_REVIEW_STATE from CKT_ADMIN_APPEAL where ADMIN_APPEAL_ID = cast(@miscNum1 as decimal(15))

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb
